content.question: ​The function <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals ln open parentheses 3 x plus 1 close parentheses minus ln open parentheses x squared plus x minus 2 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>-</mo><mi>ln</mi><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. What are all values of <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> for which <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses less than 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo><</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="open parentheses negative infinity comma negative 1 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mo>∞</mo><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma infinity close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma infinity close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> only

content.answer: ​<math alttext="open parentheses 3 comma infinity close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> only

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
